nodes.text: Bakkar Spire was a spire in Black Spire Outpost on the planet Batuu that acted as the location of a spaceport. During the conflict between the First Order and the Resistance, the spaceport served as a base of operations for Hondo Ohnaka, who frequently recruited crew members after securing the use of the Millennium Falcon from Chewbacca.

Bakkar Spire was identified on a map card distributed at the Star Wars: Galactic Nights event on May 27, 2018. Its location corresponds to the entrance area for the Millenium Falcon: Smuggler's Run attraction at the Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge themed land.
